name: v3.12.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Use strings.Builder for bar string composition by @oerlikon in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/143
* Make go vet happy by @oerlikon in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/144

## New Contributors
* @oerlikon made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/143

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.12.0...v3.12.1

name: v3.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixes case where bar was being incorrectly cleared on finished #75 by @janpfeifer in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/140
* feat: exit the bar to keep current state by @Mr1X in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/142

## New Contributors
* @janpfeifer made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/140
* @Mr1X made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/142

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.11.0...v3.12.0

name: v3.11.0
body:
## What's Changed
* #86 Add option to write description at end of line instead of begin of line by @LeoVie in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/137

## New Contributors
* @LeoVie made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/137

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.10.1...v3.11.0

name: v3.10.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle very-slow iterations by @howeyc in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/136

## New Contributors
* @howeyc made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/136

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.10.0...v3.10.1

name: v3.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Use golang.org/x/term replacement instead of deprecated package by @Jacalz in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/131
* feat: on clear, correctly flush with carriage return by @hexnaught in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/134
* feat: option to keep showing elapsed time on finish by @hexnaught in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/133

## New Contributors
* @Jacalz made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/131
* @hexnaught made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/134

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.9.0...v3.10.0

name: v3.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove superfluous carriage returns by @NathanBaulch in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/127
* Fix RenderBlank when throttled by @NathanBaulch in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/126
* Use the existing humanize function to support GB/s rates by @NathanBaulch in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/125
* Show elapsed time when no length is given by @gabe565 in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/122

## New Contributors
* @NathanBaulch made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/127
* @gabe565 made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/122

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.8.7...v3.9.0

name: v3.8.7
body: - fix bug in printing newline

name: v3.8.6
body: - update deps

name: v3.8.5
body:
## What's Changed
* ChangeMax64 did not work with OptionShowBytes by @T1MOXA in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/116
* Force redraw on Describe() by @flowchartsman in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/110

## New Contributors
* @T1MOXA made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/116
* @flowchartsman made their first contribution in https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/pull/110

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/compare/v3.8.4...v3.8.5

name: v3.8.4
body:
- allow animated saucer head
- update deps

name: v3.8.2
body: update deps

name: v3.8.0
body:
- add silent function `DefaultBytesSilent` and `DefaultSilent`
- add `Close` function

name: v3.7.5
body: - fixed duplicate rendering of extra empty lines 255f756

name: v3.7.2
body: - try to get stderr width if stdout is not a terminal 31fc10c  (thanks @rafaelmartins!)

name: v3.7.0
body: - add ANSI support b404f80069811c6d282fb69684a48f5b2c6aafa3

name: v3.6.2
body:
- add NewReader function (#85) c121f44
- remove timer when 100% is hit 953dc78

name: v3.6.1
body:
- better getting width on windows
- bug fix:  Prevent changing current maximum on Finish (#82)

name: v3.6.0
body: - add `IsFinished()` to determine if finished

name: v3.5.0
body: - add visibility flag to quickly turn off

name: v3.4.0
body:
- bug fix, use base of 1024 https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/commit/af747beff95e77f9419e200f3cbb87f33473a434
- feature: use custom it/s string https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/commit/a9876a43437eb765fbf7c28d5a747c2ee6538fcf (thanks @felicianotech !)

name: v3.3.1
body: - os specific syscall

name: v3.3.0
body:
- feature: add nice defaults to API 2d90db9
- new feature: add option for full bar 24891a9

name: v3.2.3
body:
- bug fix: spinner should spin time based
- new feature: allow bytes to show it/s

name: v3.2.0
body: - indeterminate progress bars (i.e. ones set to `-1`) will now display as spinners

name: v3.1.1
body: - bug fix for showing iterations

name: v3.1.0
body: - add ChangeMax

name: v3.0.2
body: - UI fix: don't show so many parentheses

name: v3.0.1
body: - when it/s < 1, use it/min

name: v3.0.0
body:
- API change: ChangeMax removed
- API change: OptionSetBytes(x) -> OptionShowBytes(true)  This way you don't have to set the number twice
- You can ignore length by passing "-1" as the number

name: v2.15.0
body: - Add Set and Set64

name: v2.14.2
body: - show final it/s

name: v2.14.1
body: - show the total mb/s when doing

name: v2.14.0
body:
- make `PredictTime` optional
- add `ChangeMax` and `GetMax` to dynamically alter the progressbar

name: v2.13.2
body: use rolling average to calculate time left

name: v2.13.1
body: bug fix: need to lock the mutex state around adding https://github.com/schollz/progressbar/commit/af7d746f16b95569356ace1d7eccc40370a9f676

name: v2.13.0
body: Add New64

name: v2.12.1
body: Allow finishing only once

name: v2.12.0
body: Add oncompletion function

name: v2.11.0
body: - Add option clear on finishing (`OptionClearOnFinish`)

name: v2.10.0
body: - add Describe function

name: v2.9.1
body: * use int64 everywhere, add API for Int64

name: v2.9.0
body:
* added *ProgressBar.Set(int) error (094499d4d041c883e59e317074dd96c3c6e6e8e9)
* implement io.Writer for i/o progress operations (14e376a752470c325c982c791b900a3bbd6141f1)

name: v2.8.0
body: Added OptionShowCount() (dfe83207a3b937a6bd864b993a3350258bd67007) to show iterations

name: v2.5.0
body:
**New features:**

- Option to show iterations per second
- Option to show bytes per second

**Bug fixes:**

- Use color-transformed string for line width detection

name: v2.3.1
body:
Bug fix:

- Use the color-transformed string for line width detection

name: v2.3.0
body: Added support for color codes

name: v2.2.0
body:
New Features:

- Added Description and SaucerHead feature

name: v2.1.1
body: Use go.mod

name: v2.0.0
body: - Uses functional options

New features:

- Added ability to set writer

name: v0.4
body:
Features:

- Added theme feature (thanks @Kiura!)

Bug fixes:

- Newline bug on mac OS (thanks @Kiura agian!)
